title: How to Answer "Dating Me Is Like..." on Hinge

steps.title: Who doesn’t love a surprise snack at the bottom of their takeout bag?
steps.content: Who doesn’t love a surprise snack at the bottom of their takeout bag? Compare yourself to finding an extra chicken nugget (or the fast food side of your choice) to let potential matches know that dating you would be cause for joyous celebration. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Compare yourself to the perfect pair of pants.
steps.content: Compare yourself to the perfect pair of pants. Whether you love shopping or not, there’s one thing we all hate: trying on jeans after jeans after jeans in search of the perfect fit (for the perfect price). It’s time-consuming. It’s frustrating. It can even be humiliating. And frankly, it’s a lot like dating—most of the time. Let potential matches know you’re the perfect fit with this witty answer. [2] X Research source

steps.title: We all know the serendipity of hearing that special song unexpectedly.
steps.content: We all know the serendipity of hearing that special song unexpectedly. Whether it’s Taylor Swift’s “Love Story (Taylor's Version),” Blue Swede’s “Hooked on a Feeling,” or the Reba McEntire theme song, we've all experienced the pure, ecstatic joy of hearing those opening notes just when you’ve been feeling like you could really use a lift. Show potential dates that you’re the human embodiment of hearing their favorite song, right when they need it. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Compare a relationship with you to an exciting and absorbing TV show.
steps.content: Compare a relationship with you to an exciting and absorbing TV show. This answer serves as a 2-in-1: it conveys how thrilling it would be to date you while also giving potential matches an idea of what sort of television you enjoy—very important info before agreeing to that first date! [4] X Research source If you don't watch GOT (or were disappointed by that final season...), reference any high-action, deceptively absorbing, or just plain long TV show, like Succession or Naruto.

steps.title: Oh mama, what’s better than a hot shower after a week of camping?
steps.content: Oh mama, what’s better than a hot shower after a week of camping? Let a potential match know you’re there to help them relax and unwind after a week of nonstop fun. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Be funny but honest by comparing dating you to a wild roller coaster ride.
steps.content: Be funny but honest by comparing dating you to a wild roller coaster ride. Look, relationships are never perfect, right? That doesn’t mean you can’t enjoy them! [6] X Research source

steps.title: Is there any greater luxury than getting to stay home from class or work?
steps.content: Is there any greater luxury than getting to stay home from class or work? Let the hotties know that dating you is equivalent to the bliss of unexpectedly getting to sleep in and watch TV all day (gotta catch up on The Price Is Right !)—and not have to congregate with weird coworkers, if you’d rather adapt this answer to your day job. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Compare yourself to a nice warm mug of hot chocolate.
steps.content: Compare yourself to a nice warm mug of hot chocolate. This answer showcases your warm, sweet, comforting personality. Who wouldn’t want to date the human version of hot cocoa? [8] X Research source

steps.title: What’s more exciting than instantaneous, unexpected riches?
steps.content: What’s more exciting than instantaneous, unexpected riches? Convey just how thrilling dating you is by likening a relationship with you to surprise wealth—and perhaps suggest to your potential matches that you have a bit to offer financially. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Nothing like the comfort of a nice, warm bed.
steps.content: Nothing like the comfort of a nice, warm bed. Let the hotties know you’re everything cozy and indulgent by comparing yourself to the luxury of a few extra hours’ slumber. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Let matches know dating you is akin to sorcery.
steps.content: Let matches know dating you is akin to sorcery. Who wakes up from a night of partying without a hangover? Magic people, that’s who. If that’s what it’s like to date you, put this on your profile and you’ll have your pick of cuties before you can say “hair of the dog.” [11] X Research source

steps.title: Go for self-deprecating by comparing yourself to a very minor celeb.
steps.content: Go for self-deprecating by comparing yourself to a very minor celeb. The dry humor in this answer is sure to make potential matches chuckle, or at least breathe out through their noses quickly in amusement. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Let matches know they can relax dating you.
steps.content: Let matches know they can relax dating you. That exquisite relief that you feel when you realize you left your door open to potential thieves—but you and your pets and all your beloved treasures are safe and sound? Yeah, that’s a great feeling. Let matches know that’s what a relationship with you would feel like—all the time. [13] X Research source

steps.title: If there’s a greater joy than a free scoop, we don't know what it is.
steps.content: If there’s a greater joy than a free scoop, we don't know what it is. Convey that dating you wouldn’t just be a sweet treat—it would be unexpected bliss. (And not only is this a great answer, going out for ice cream makes for a great first date!) [14] X Research source

steps.title: Show your date you’re a one-in-a-million match.
steps.content: Show your date you’re a one-in-a-million match. Use this answer to evoke the uniqueness of a snowflake, the rarity of catching one, and the childlike whimsy of dancing under a winter snowfall. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Not only does this convey a fun relationship, it’s a great first date idea.
steps.content: Not only does this convey a fun relationship, it’s a great first date idea. Your potential match will read this and know instantly that you’re the sort of person who they can’t let down their hair around and have a good time with. While we can’t escape the mundanity and exhaustion of the occasional long day on the job, we can partner with people who can help us unwind afterward! [16] X Research source

steps.title: Show matches you’re the kind of person they can be themselves around.
steps.content: Show matches you’re the kind of person they can be themselves around. Comparing a relationship with you to donning a comfortable pair of sweats is a great way to let your potential dates know that they can be their authentic selves around you, mess and all. [17] X Research source

steps.title: Nothing’s better than that first bite of cake. Or lasagna. Or pickled beets.
steps.content: Nothing’s better than that first bite of cake. Or lasagna. Or pickled beets. Evoke the pleasure of that first taste in your answer and you’ve not only successfully advertised yourself, you’ve got a natural conversation starter for anyone who hearts your answer: “What’s your favorite food? And would you like to go get some?” [18] X Research source

steps.title: Evoke the pure heart-swelling peace of watching the sun go down.
steps.content: Evoke the pure heart-swelling peace of watching the sun go down. Let potential matches know you’re warm, beautiful, a light in the darkness, surrounded by fireflies, the perfect time to roast marshmallows…OK, this metaphor is falling apart, but you get the idea. [19] X Research source

steps.title: Let your matches know it’s time to level up.
steps.content: Let your matches know it’s time to level up. Dating you means they've joined the big leagues! What better way to express maturity and experience—plus utter joy and celebration—than by evoking a college graduation, that long-awaited day? [20] X Research source

steps.title: Show your matches that a new world of fun and exploration awaits them.
steps.content: Show your matches that a new world of fun and exploration awaits them. Speaking of upgrades, this is another answer that will show potential matches you’re a cut above the rest. Users who see this answer will know that dating you is serious business! [21] X Research source

steps.title: This analogy suggests that dating is hard work—unless they’re dating you.
steps.content: This analogy suggests that dating is hard work—unless they’re dating you. Once your perfect match finds you, it’s like never having to work again! Strike up a convo with anyone who hearts this answer by asking them what they'd spend their lottery winnings on. [22] X Research source

steps.title: Evoke the joy of no longer having repayments hanging over your head.
steps.content: Evoke the joy of no longer having repayments hanging over your head. Oh, the relief! The sweet, sweet freedom. Convey to your date just how enjoyable and fulfilling it would be to date you by comparing your relationship to the giddiness of being debt-free. [23] X Research source

steps.title: Remind your matches of the warmth and happiness of a sunny day.
steps.content: Remind your matches of the warmth and happiness of a sunny day. Sunshine at last! Let matches know that dating you is like finally seeing the sun after nothing but bad weather. And if you've been on dating apps for a while, you've endured a lot of bad weather (by which we mean awful dates). [24] X Research source

steps.title: Compare dating you to the comfort of cuddling a furry friend.
steps.content: Compare dating you to the comfort of cuddling a furry friend. Not only does this answer show your matches what a joy it would be to date you, it also suggests where the two of you might end up if things…you know… go well . [25] X Research source
